author: rvesse
msg: A couple more enhancements to HttpQuery
- Adds a getResponseCode() property so code that uses the class directly can retrieve the response code after a request has been made

- Fixes an error handling issue where execCommon() would re-wrap a QueryExceptionHTTP as a QueryExceptionHTTP because it was catching JenaException (which QueryExceptionHTTP is descended from) and the re-wrapping was hiding the error details from the consumer of the exception (e.g. the response code)

author: bobby
msg: svn merge -c 1309077 from trunk. FIXES MAPREDUCE-4072. User set java.library.path seems to overwrite default creating problems native lib loading (Anupam Seth via bobby)
